name: DailyAnime
0:
”Alexa, open daily anime”
”animes airing on Monday”
”animes of today”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily anime
des: This skill is able to tell you the list of animes airing on any day of the week, using either the day o saying "today" or "tomorrow".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
